# =========================
# Visual Studio .gitignore
# =========================

# User-specific files
*.rsuser
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Build results
[Bb]in/
[Oo]bj/
[Ll]og/
Debug/
Release/
x64/
x86/
[Aa][Rr][Mm]/
[Aa][Rr][Mm]64/

# Visual Studio cache/options
.vs/
.vscode/

# Windows image file caches
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db

# Database files
*.mdf
*.ldf

# Backup & temporary files
*.bak
*.tmp
*.temp

# NuGet packages
*.nupkg
# Exclude the packages folder if using package restore
packages/

# Test results
[Tt]est[Rr]esult*/
[Bb]uild[Ll]og.*

# Auto-generated files
*.log
*.tlog
*.idb
*.pdb

# Publish output
publish/
app.publish/

# IIS
_IISExpress/
*.vspscc
*.vssscc
*.scc

# Rider / JetBrains IDEs
.idea/

# Others
*.dbmdl
*.jfm
*.pfx
*.snk
